body: Yet another guilty pleasure made by the same artist.

I want kaito to get revenge by him fucking the boys mom and grounding them like headbutted the moms and telling them that they know what they did and are getting punish and make the sisters beat them or using toys on the boy

this is fucking disgusting. the author has zero morals to write something like this. little kid is stupid, the sisters are not even characters (what happened to the younger sister when the older one was taken over???) and its obvious the author has no morals because of the level of sexual acts that they draw the bullies doing with another persons body without anyone stopping them. all in all just a garbage doujin.
I wish this had a sequel.

The bully was an idiot to trust his body to the kid, but the shota was even dumber. He could have easily used this against the bully, like: 
-what if i damage your original body, what is going to happen to you?

man that shota was so disappointing and beta, like Brah he just let it happen to them and do to his failure to stop him the guy goes on in his sisters body (by the way, his real sister is still at his grandma's place) to go do this to more girls. Bro, I'm done with this bull crap, I kind of hate the protagonist.
I Need More Series Like this! This is Awesome!!
What a good friend, letting his fellow friend enjoy the body lots
